meanings.definition: A person or thing that expends or uses up resources.
meanings.sent1: The diligent worker was an efficient expenders of company funds.
meanings.sent2: The team of expenders completed the project under budget.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel was quite the expenders of nuts, always storing them away.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was an expenders of joy, filling the room with happiness.
meanings.sent5: The roaring fire was an expenders of warmth on the cold night.

meanings.definition: Plural form of expender, referring to multiple individuals or things that expend resources.
meanings.sent1: The expenders in the office worked together to reduce waste.
meanings.sent2: The expenders at the event managed the budget effectively.
meanings.sent3: The expenders in the garden were the busy bees, pollinating flowers.
meanings.sent4: The expenders of knowledge shared their wisdom with the students.
meanings.sent5: The expenders of energy were the athletes, pushing themselves to the limit.
